data.text: @SydneyBucksbaum @STARZ Wonder if he was laughing when he said that one lead works harder than the other. There are TWO leads and TWO main characters on the show, but the CEO and Starz continually make it clear there is only one. Caitriona is wonderful but SO IS SAM HEUGHAN https://t.co/wsIfB1qj3i
@Minetoknow1 @SydneyBucksbaum @STARZ @TallShipProds Co-sign 100%. I stopped watching in June 2016 because of the blue check bully. I was told to ignore, so I am.

@SydneyBucksbaum @STARZ @TallShipProds You know what I worrry my little head about? A show whose cast dislikes and belittles fans and who allow check-marked bullies to routinely threaten and stalk fans. This show is already dead to me. I wish you the future you deserve.
At this point, @STARZ is just worried about working @Outlander_STARZ @caitrionambalfe and @SamHeughan to death. They have 10 books to get through! #Outlander
